title: Server problems
body: We've been having server issues for the last few days, but if you're reading this we're hopefully on the mend. Hold tight folks, all will be well.
author: Dan

comments.author: Stephanie
comments.body:
Oh, good...you're back. Because I really can't get through the day without a visit to the Moxie Blog.

I guess this affected Nicole and Stephanie V, as well?

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: I don't think it affected their sites as bad as mine, but I'm sure they were down periodically. Apparently I've been getting too much traffic...

comments.author: steph v.
comments.body: You're just too popular! (My site was down for a bit yesterday, but no big deal).

comments.author: Evan Erwin
comments.body:
Yes, secretly I yearn for every last update to the Moxie World. I have it in my coveted "Must Read" Onfolio folder, and with each new post an angel gets its wings...

Which means that yesterday some poor angel died a horrible, horrible death (it fell in a meatgrinder too...nasty).

Um, yeah, so anyway, welcome back Dan :)

comments.author: Beavis
comments.body: My site once went down due to the mydoom virus.  Yikes!  But Dan, no worries, I will be here waiting for you forever.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Angels have wings... a new post is born.
